Old Video From Visakhapatnam Falsely Linked To Kolkata Rape And Murder Case

Claim:
Video shows the dead body of the Kolkata rape and murder case victim at the hospital.

Fact:
Months old video from Visakhapatnam shared in false context.

A 21 second long video showing hospital staff lining a corridor with folded hands as a corpse is being transported on a stretcher, is being widely circulated online. Multiple users shared the video with hashtags such as "#kolkata," "#kolkatarapemurdercase" & #doctor, linking it to the rape and murder of a trainee doctor at RG Kar Hospital in Kolkata. A few others claimed it to be the "last video" showing the "dead body" of the victim.

A reverse image search on the keyframes of the viral footage yielded a report by Dainik Bhaskar, dated June 1, 2024. Carrying the same clip, the report stated that a man donated his son's organ after he died in a road accident.

It elaborated that Praveen Mehta, who hails from Jalore, is settled in Visakhapatnam, along with his family, where he runs a cosmetics business. His son Vipin met with an accident on May 29, and was admitted to the hospital where he later succumbed to his injuries. Following Vipin's demise, his father and mother decided to donate his organs. The doctors, and staff of the hospital bestowed 'Guard of Honour' to Vipin's corpse to appreciate his family's decision. We further found the hospital seen in the video to be "Pinnacle Hospital."

A News18 report further corroborated that a family decided to donate the organ of their son, Vipin Mehta, who passed away in a road accident in Visakhapatnam. Following which, the hospital gave a 'Guard of Honour' to his body.

Conclusion:
Hence, an old video from Visakhapatnam has been falsely linked to the recent case of rape and murder of a doctor in Kolkata.

Result: False

Sources:
- Report By Dainik Bhaskar, Dated June 1, 2024
- Report By News18, Dated June 2, 2024
title: A video showing hospital staff lining a corridor with folded hands...
vclaim: A video showing hospital staff giving guard of honor to a corpse is being falsely shared as footage of the Kolkata rape and murder victim's dead body. The video actually shows a guard of honor given to Vipin Mehta's body at Pinnacle Hospital in Visakhapatnam after his family decided to donate his organs following his death in a road accident.
